articles.author: Anthony Castrovince
articles.title: Cy Young Award winners revealed tonight (7 ET, MLB Network) - MLB.com
articles.description:
The award call came in as expected, and now two of the absolute best pitchers in the sport find themselves on short and lofty lists.
Surprising no one after wowing everyone, Tigers ace Tarik Skubal was named the American League Cy Young Award winner and Pirat…
